item.title: Why did I start this blog
item.description: It all started with OriginLab. Or rather, the hatred towards it. As a chemistry graduate student with limited programming experience, I had to plot and summarize huge amount of data coming from various scanners - IR, UV-Vis, Current-Voltage, NMR, you name it. And, as a chemistry graduate student trained in China, I picked up pirated versions of OriginLab as my primary tool. Because “everyone else had been using it”, they said.
